The Missile Launcher is a powerful
weapon, but it has limited ammo.<NOD
Collect additional ammunition
from fallen enemies.<NOD<END

#0900
<DNP0900<SKJ0024:0000<SK+0024
<PRI<MS3
Driven insane by his punishment,
Ballos was confined to the floating
island in the sky by his sister, Jenka.<NOD
That was all she could do.<NOD
For Jenka, killing her own younger
brother would be impossible.<NOD<END
#0901
<DNP0901<SKJ0025:0000<SK+0025
<PRI<MS3
Jenka's witch daughter, Misery,
is to blame for the Demon Crown...<NOD
She forced Ballos to create it.<NOD
Because of this offense, she was
cursed by the Crown, compelled to
obey whoever possesses it.<NOD
The curse can be lifted if the Demon
Crown is destroyed.<NOD<CLR
However...<NOD<END
